#include<stdio.h>
long int answer[22]={1,7,31,111,351,1023,2815,7423,18943,47103,114687,274431,647167,1507327,3473407,7929855,1179647,6815743,6291455,7340031,6291455,8388607};
int main(){
long long int n;
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
scanf("%lld",&n);
if(n>22) n=22;
printf("%ld\n",answer[n-1]);
}
return 0;
}
